bananas_and_dragonfruits: Banana and dragonfruit smoothie: Blend bananas and dragonfruits together with some milk and honey.
Banana and dragonfruit salad: Mix sliced bananas and dragonfruits together with some lemon juice and honey.
Banana and dragonfruit bowl: Layer sliced bananas and dragonfruits with yogurt and granola.

equations.2x + 3 = 7: x = 2 (Subtract 3 from both sides, then divide by 2).
